concept.title: Laundry Room Etiquete
concept.shortdesc: Like many NC State students, this may be your first time doing laundry in a shared facility. It is important to practice laundry room etiquette to respect your fellow residents and their belongings.

conbody.p: Here are some things to keep in mind while using the shared laundry rooms:

ul.li:
Be timely in removing clothes from washers and dryers
download the speedqueen app to see when machines are available
Set a timer on your phone to keep track of time

Do not use an excessive amount of machines during peak hours
Peaks hours include weekdays after 3pm and weekends

Give other residents a 15-20 minute grace period before removing their clothes from the machine
Place wet clothes on top of the washing machine
Place dry clothes on the folding tables
Make sure to remove all clothes from the machines
Leave the washing machine doors open after use to prevent mildew
